content: chain-1 1 single_crochet in chain-1 join with slip_stitch to the next double_crochet the beginning single_crochet 65 66 67 68 page 10 of 12 dorothea blanket by dada s place 6 5 round 4 chain-4 skip chain-1 space make double_crochet in the next single_crochet 66 make * chain-1 skip chain-1 space make 1 double_crochet in the next single_crochet 67 repeat from * to the next corner 68 make chain-1 1 double_crochet chain-3 1 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain-1 1 double_crochet in the next single_crochet 69 70 71 72 continue working chain-1 until you reach the last make chain-1 1 double_crochet chain-3 make chain-1 skip chain-1 space skip chain-1 space 1 double_crochet in the next corner 1 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain-1 make 1 double_crochet in the next single_crochet single_crochet around the blanket in 1 double_crochet in the next single_crochet chain-1 join with slip_stitch to the corners make chain-1 1 double_crochet third chain of the beginning chain-3 1 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain-1 chain-4 1 double_crochet in the next single_crochet 73 74 75 76 make row 5 9 i skipped working on ws we re yarn over and pull the make chain-1 them in the tutorial going to make a bobble yarn through all 6 loops because they are the stitch so make on your hook same as the row 3 and 4 5 incomplete double_crochet in round 10 make chain-1 turn the next chain-1 space 77 78 79 80 77 then make slip_stitch in the next single_crochet 78 make 1 slip_stitch in the next chain-1 space 1 slip_stitch in the next single_crochet 79 make * 1 bobble in the next chain-1 space 1 slip_stitch in the next single_crochet 1 slip_stitch in the next chain-1 space 1 slip_stitch in the next single_crochet repeat from * to the next corner in the corners make 1 bobble into chain-3 space 1 slip_stitch in the next single_crochet 1 slip_stitch in the next chain-1 space 1 slip_stitch in the next single_crochet 80 repeat from * around the blanket this picture shows the right side of the blanket page 11 of 12 dorothea blanket by dada s place about the pattern thank you very much for purchasing my pattern i m grateful that you decided to buy my pattern and support my work i invested a lot of time and effort into making this pattern easy to follow but if you have any additional questions feel free to contact me through my email dadasplace@gmail com i can t wait to see your versions of the dorothea blanket so please tag me and use the hashtag #dorotheablanket when you post it on social media i will share the best photos in my instagram and facebook stories and on pinterest copyright this pattern is for personal use only do not claim the pattern as your own the pattern or parts of it cannot be resold shared published altered translated or posted anywhere over the internet or offline you can sell the finished product for this pattern please give credit
